Summary: An inexpensive alternative to the K-cup
text:
As the other reviewers have said, this is not a K-cup! Having said that, in my experience it is a great inexpensive alternative to use in your Keurig brewer. I received an order of three 36 count boxes. The 36 count boxes were unmarked brown cardboard boxes, not the colorful retail packaging shown on amazon. See the customer image I uploaded. Inside each cardboard box, there are three clear heavy duty plastic bags, each of which holds 12 of the pods. I also have uploaded an image of a pod next to a K-cup for comparison. The bags are not resealable! You will have to seal them with a clip or put them in an airtight bag or tupperware to prevent the rest of the pods from loosing freshness. I have found the pods work just as well as a normal K-cup. I have no complaints about their function.

About the coffee: It is a very strong bold blend. I think it tastes great, but it is too strong for my wife's taste! If you like making a bigger cup (running water through the pod twice) it does a great job. I definitely recommend this if you like strong coffee!
